article_text: Boulder is pretty good at producing rock bands, and by "rock," we mean the in-your-face, guitar-heavy, leather-clad variety — you know, the good kind. For a prime example, look no farther than BANDITS.

article_metadata.description: A  giant pumpkin belonging to Andy Corbin of Cheyenne, Wyo., is lifted onto the scale during the annual pumpkin contest Saturday at the Flower Bin, 1805 Nelson Road.

og.title: 917-pound monster wins Longmont pumpkin contest

article_summary:
Boulder is pretty good at producing rock bands, and by "rock," we mean the in-your-face, guitar-heavy, leather-clad variety — you know, the good kind.
For a prime example, look no farther than BANDITS.
